name: Hunt: Showdown - Biatatá: Still Waters Run Deep
summary: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Biatatá (Hunter), Cobra da Várzea (Scottfield Model 3 Spitfire), Proteção do Andarilho (Winfield 1893 Slate), and Língua de Fogo (Liquid Fire Bomb).
